scripts.format:cs: dotnet format android/*.sln --verbosity quiet || echo 'Note: .sln file not found. Unity will generate it when you open the project. Use your IDE formatter (VS Code, Visual Studio, Rider) which will use .editorconfig automatically.'
scripts.format:cs:check: dotnet format android/*.sln --verify-no-changes --verbosity quiet || echo 'Note: .sln file not found. Unity will generate it when you open the project.'
